contentencoded:
Neuroscience research says teenagers don’t just like to sleep; they need to sleep. A new CDC study suggests early high school start times are not just hard for students they’re dangerous.


Guest: Kyla Wahlstrom, Professor of Education at the University of Minnesota, and Director of the Center for Applied Research and Education Improvement.
